title: No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab
OB: Currently, when I change the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, no children nodes are listed.
EB: The expected behavior is that when I change the data source, the children nodes from the new data source should be listed out.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the data set editor page in the query tab.
2. Select a data set.
3. Change the data source for the selected data set.
4. Check if the children nodes from the new data source are listed out correctly.
